pages.text:
April 2024 County of Marin EMS O 4
SEVERE PRE-ECLAMPSIA/
ECLAMPSIA
Indications
• Pregnancy >20 weeks gestation or up to 6 weeks postpartum
• Pre-eclampsia:
• Hypertension (SBP ≥160 or DBP ≥110)
• Mental status changes
• Persistent headache
• Visual disturbances
• Peripheral edema
• Eclampsia:
• Pre-eclampsia symptoms and seizure
Position on left side
ALS RMC
Transport quickly with a
quiet environment
(no siren)
NS IV TKO started enroute
If DBP>110
If seizure
• Go to Seizure Policy, N2 • ☎ PHYSICIAN CONSULT for NTG
• NTG 0.4mg spray/SL
• MR in 10 min
